root.name: AquaZone
root.description: Overview AquaZone's claim to fame was when game reviewer Jeff Gerstmann previewed it on Gamespot's weekly show alongside Rich Gallup. AquaZone is known for its minimalistic gameplay, as the player can only view the screen. Until today, no one really knows what the game was made for... Being an Xbox 360 game, the game does have achievement points, but they are all entitled "secret achievement". At the end of the Gamespot preview, Jeff Gerstmann yelled "I have entered the Aqua Zone and there is no escape"
